entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Periods of light snow beginning in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023
